name: Kenkai
startIntroPart1: Kendal, leader of the glorious revolution
startIntroPart2: A nation that struggles to provide the very basic necessitiesto sustain life for its people, is a nation that will fall into chaos. When the nations around you fall for their own greed, or desire for lands that arent theirs, who will rise up to stop them? You are, Kendal.
declaringWar: My people have agreed your nation is a danger to us, i hope your peoples support you for what comes next.
attacked: Your play for power will only end in your ruin. I only weep for your citizens.
defeated: I suppose our passion for a free world wasn't shared. The revolution isn't perfect, but it was needed. And now it ends.
introduction: Hello fellow leader, you enter the lands of the truly free. Are you a great leader? Or a tyrant to be overthrown?
neutralHello: The winds of change bring us together once more.
neutralNo: No need to say everything that comes to mind.
hateHello: Coming here like im not itching to kill you is crazy.
hateYes: Get a load of this guy.
afterPeace: Really whiffed that war huh? Best to back out and make friendly.
tradeRequest: Check this out, dont say no or I'll look really bad to my advisors.
uniqueText: Allied militaristic city-states grant units faster when at war with another civilization. Rebel units may spawn in enemy cities when at war.
uniques: [Militaristic City-States grant units [5] times as fast when you are at war with a common nation <in [Your] cities>
Rebel units may spawn <when at war> <in [Enemy] cities> <every [2] turns>
